name: muscatel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sweet wine made from muscat grapes: a half-bottle of sweet muscatel This town is very much the centre of large mass-producing vineyards, including Muscatels.
a type of grape (= a small, round, green or purple fruit), or large raisin (= dried grape) made from this type of grape: I replaced the sultanas in the recipe with muscatels. With the cheese there were muscatel grapes, crackers, and salted almonds.
More examplesFewer examplesThe company started with dessert wines, like port, sherry, and muscatel. A number of traditional bars serve the sweet Málaga wine made from muscatel grapes and dispensed from huge barrels.Dates, muscatels, figs, and sultanas all work well here.
